name: Troublesome Warehouse
description:
Use mouse to grab boxes from delivery truck and put them into your warehouse. Try not to damage them too much while doing that. Once all boxes are unloaded the truck will deliver new batch of random boxes.

On the right you will find Deliveries button. Use it to look up and accept delivery tasks. Load correct type of boxes into delivery truck to earn money.

Be careful not to stack your warehouse with too many boxes or you will loose them all!

Money can be used on upgrades (menu button on the left)
